statements: SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT crop_type, yield FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT location, date, yield FROM yield_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM yield_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(yield) AS average_yield FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'Iowa';
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'FarmA' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT crop_type, AVG(yield) AS avg_yield FROM yield_data GROUP BY crop_type HAVING AVG(yield) > 50 ORDER BY avg_yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND location = 'FarmB' ORDER BY yield ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM yield_data ORDER BY location;
SELECT AVG(yield) AS avg_yield, location FROM yield_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_yield DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE quality_score > 80 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, yield FROM yield_data WHERE quality_score < 70 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT date, productivity_change FROM productivity_analysis WHERE trend_analysis LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'Farm A' ORDER BY yield DESC, quality_score ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM yield_data WHERE quality_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE quality_score > 80 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(yield) AS avg_yield FROM yield_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_yield DESC;
SELECT date, productivity_change, trend_analysis FROM productivity_analysis WHERE productivity_change < 0.5 AND trend_analysis LIKE 'positive%' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, location, yield, quality_score FROM yield_data WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California') AND yield > 0.6 ORDER BY location, date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM yield_data WHERE quality_score >= 70;
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn'
SELECT yield_amount, crop_type FROM yield_data ORDER BY yield_amount DESC
SELECT date, yield_amount FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'FarmA'
SELECT id, date, location FROM yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT * FROM yield_data WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, trend_type, value FROM trends WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM productivity WHERE productivity_metric = 'Yield per Acre' AND value < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, productivity_metric, value FROM productivity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, date, crop_type, location FROM yield_data WHERE location = 'Field A' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM YieldData;
SELECT id, date, crop_type, yield_amount FROM YieldData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT date, yield_amount FROM YieldData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM Trends WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;

SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, trend_name, productivity_date FROM Analysis JOIN Trends ON Analysis.trend_id = Trends.trend_id JOIN Productivity ON Analysis.productivity_id = Productivity.productivity_id;
SELECT * FROM YieldData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT id, date, crop_type FROM YieldData WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield, crop_type FROM YieldData GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT a.analysis_id, a.analysis_date, t.trend_name, p.productivity_score FROM Analysis a JOIN Trends t ON a.trend_id = t.trend_id JOIN Productivity p ON a.productivity_id = p.productivity_id;
SELECT * FROM YieldData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM YieldData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT yield_value, date FROM YieldData WHERE yield_value > 0.5;
SELECT productivity_metric, productivity_score FROM Productivity WHERE productivity_score < 80 ORDER BY productivity_score DESC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM YieldData ORDER BY yield_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, yield_value FROM YieldData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, COUNT(*) FROM Trends GROUP BY trend_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT productivity_metric, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_score FROM Productivity GROUP BY productivity_metric ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
